description.value:
Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Paralyze]{Paralyze} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Stinking Cloud]{Stinking Cloud} for a black dragon exemplar).

You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.
